welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Oceanside, a charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant local culture, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Oceanside has to offer during your stay!"

restaurants.name: Pizzaiola
restaurants.description: Pizzaiola is a american restaurant located in Oceanside.

restaurants.name: La Bottega
restaurants.description: La Bottega is a italian restaurant located in Oceanside.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mc Clellan-Palomar Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for chartered and private aircrafts.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
